name: Dangerous Roads
description:
Hey.

Accelerate with the Up arrow
Steer the car with the Left and Right arrows
Keep your left hand free to not die

Assets used from the Devil's Work.shop :
https://devilsworkshop.itch.io/low-poly-3d-and-pixel-2d-rpg-game-assets
https://devilsworkshop.itch.io/low-poly-auto-racing-car-pack
https://devilsworkshop.itch.io/low-poly-3d-city-builder-devilsworkshop
